verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph.<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> into thine <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%> have they <S%H2930>defiled;<s%> they have <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> on <S%H5856>heaps.<s%>

<S%H853><s%> The dead <S%H5038>bodies<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> have they <S%H5414>given<s%> to be <S%H3978>meat<s%> unto the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of thy <S%H2623>saints<s%> unto the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
Their <S%H1818>blood<s%> have they <S%H8210>shed<s%> like <S%H4325>water<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and there was <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> them.
We are <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to our <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> a <S%H3933>scorn<s%> and <S%H7047>derision<s%> to them that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> us.
How <S%H5704>long,<s%> <S%H4100><s%> <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> wilt thou be <S%H599>angry<s%> <S%H5331>forever?<s%> shall thy <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H1197>burn<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> <S%H784>fire?<s%>

Pour <S%H8210>out<s%> thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> thee, and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> have <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> upon thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> they have <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and laid <S%H8074>waste<s%> his dwelling <S%H5116>place.<s%>

O <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> against us <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H5771>iniquities:<s%> let thy tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> <S%H4116>speedily<s%> <S%H6923>prevent<s%> us: <S%H3588>for<s%> we are brought very <S%H1809>low.<s%> <S%H3966><s%>

Help <S%H5826><s%> us, O <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H1697><s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of thy <S%H8034>name:<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us, and purge <S%H3722>away<s%> <S%H5921><s%> our <S%H2403>sins,<s%> for thy name's <S%H4616>sake.<s%> <S%H8034><s%>

Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> should the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H346>Where<s%> is their <S%H430>God?<s%> let him be <S%H3045>known<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> in our <S%H5869>sight<s%> by the <S%H5360>revenging<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> which is <S%H8210>shed.<s%>

Let the <S%H603>sighing<s%> of the <S%H615>prisoner<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; according to the <S%H1433>greatness<s%> of thy <S%H2220>power<s%> <S%H3498>preserve<s%> thou those that are <S%H1121>appointed<s%> to <S%H8546>die;<s%>

And <S%H7725>render<s%> unto our <S%H7934>neighbors<s%> <S%H7659>sevenfold<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> their <S%H2436>bosom<s%> their <S%H2781>reproach,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> thee, O <S%H136>Lord.<s%>

So <S%H587>we<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of thy <S%H4830>pasture<s%> will give thee <S%H3034>thanks<s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%> we will show <S%H5608>forth<s%> thy <S%H8416>praise<s%> to all <S%H1755>generations.<s%> <S%H1755><s%>
